Uses of Package
net.targetr.httpd

  • Packages that use net.targetr.httpd 
    Package Description
    net.targetr.httpd
    Classes for running a simple HTTP server and serving resources.
    net.targetr.httpd.handler
    Classes for handling HTTP requests.
    net.targetr.httpd.response
    Classes for encapsulating HTTP responses.
    net.targetr.httpd.util
    Utility classes for processing HTTP communications.
    net.targetr.photoframe.handler
    Classes for handling HTTP requests from web player and admin interface.
  • Classes in net.targetr.httpd used by net.targetr.httpd 
    Class Description
    Headers
    Simplified header data storage and processing.
    HttpRequest
    Encapsulates a full HTTP request sent from a HTTP client.
    HttpRequestHandler
    Handles a HTTP request and generates a suitable HTTP response.
    HttpResponse
    Encapsulates a full HTTP response to be returned to a HTTP client.
  • Classes in net.targetr.httpd used by net.targetr.httpd.handler 
    Class Description
    Headers
    Simplified header data storage and processing.
    HttpRequest
    Encapsulates a full HTTP request sent from a HTTP client.
    HttpRequestHandler
    Handles a HTTP request and generates a suitable HTTP response.
    HttpResponse
    Encapsulates a full HTTP response to be returned to a HTTP client.
  • Classes in net.targetr.httpd used by net.targetr.httpd.response 
    Class Description
    HttpResponse
    Encapsulates a full HTTP response to be returned to a HTTP client.
  • Classes in net.targetr.httpd used by net.targetr.httpd.util 
    Class Description
    HttpRequest
    Encapsulates a full HTTP request sent from a HTTP client.
  • Classes in net.targetr.httpd used by net.targetr.photoframe.handler 
    Class Description
    HttpRequest
    Encapsulates a full HTTP request sent from a HTTP client.
    HttpRequestHandler
    Handles a HTTP request and generates a suitable HTTP response.
    HttpResponse
    Encapsulates a full HTTP response to be returned to a HTTP client.
    SimpleHttpServer
    Starts the HTTP listening on a server socket.
